title: 28 - The Bridezilla of Christ - Spiritual Abuse Part 2
description: In this episode we talk more bout the "Bridezilla of Christ".  In addition, Andy has a new interest other than the Ducks called the Chemex.  We take a little bit of time to talk about what Spiritual abuse is and what it is not.
dc:creator: Voxology
